data.name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Ring of Fire
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned. It can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.

data.name: Salazzle

abilities.name: Hot Poison
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.

data.name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Panic Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Hunter's Nails
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.

data.name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.

data.name: Salazzle-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Diabolical Claws
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.name: Queen's Haze-GX
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Salazzle
data.flavorText: Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.

data.name: Salazzle

abilities.name: Roast Reveal
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

data.flavorText: Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.

data.name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Nasty Plot
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Severe Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

data.flavorText: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.

rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.text: Discard all Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Derisive Roasting
attacks.text: This attack does 90 damage for each Special Condition affecting your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The winner of competitions between Salazzle is decided by which one has the most male Salandit with it.

data.name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Tail Trickery
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.

data.name: Salazzle
data.flavorText: Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring movements to turn them into loyal servants.

attacks.name: Sudden Scorching
attacks.text: Your opponent discards a card from their hand. If this Pokémon evolved from Salandit during this turn, your opponent discards 2 more cards.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.
